Missile

Class representing a missile. Inherits from Ship.

Methods
Arm

Arms the missile

missile:Arm()
Availability

alpha 31

Status

experimental

Disarm

Disarms the missile

missile:Disarm()
Availability

alpha 31

Status

experimental

AIKamikaze

Crash into the target ship.

missile:AIKamikaze(target)
Parameters
target

the Ship to destroy

Returns

true if the command could be enacted, false otherwise

Availability

Gen 2017

Status

experimental

Attributes
isArmed

Determines if the missile is armed. True is farmed, false otherwise.

Example
if approaching_missile:isArmed then
    print("DANGER! DANGER!")
end
Availability

alpha 31

Status

experimental
